p: Following our initial search, we made the following amendments to our study protocol. We excluded papers that related to the HIV/AIDS pandemic for two main reasons: the mode of transmission is different (i.e. it is not an airborne transmission), and psychosis related to HIV/AIDS is comparatively well understood and unlikely to be relevant to the COVID-19 pandemic ( Gray et al., 2002). We also restricted our search to articles published after 2000 (just before the SARS outbreak). Post hoc we also decided to check the reference lists and citations of included papers.
